          pages:[
              "[
                \"\",
                {\"text\":\"§l会议记录
第85天

\"},
                {\"text\":\"§l主持人：\"},
                {\"text\":\"§kREDACTED

\"},
                {\"text\":\"§l讨论话题：\"},
                {\"text\":\"§kREDACTED\"},
                {\"text\":\"§l之死\"}
              ]",
              "[
                {\"text\":\"自从 \"},
                {\"text\":\"§kREDACTED \"},
                {\"text\":\"在下界旅途中被推进了熔岩，\"},
                {\"text\":\"我们认为\"},
                {\"text\":\"§kREDAC\"},
                {\"text\":\"最有可能是推他们下去的人。\"},
                {\"text\":\"在我们讨论时，他们正在被押去监狱。\"}
              ]"
            ],
            title:Meeting,
            author:Unknown,
            display:{Lore:["Found in the ancient Stronghold"]}
            }
